conversation_summary: Dim server room, walls of jittering monitors scroll endless message boards; post counts flash 2000–1000. Three entangled bodies: you, a 53-year-old in tired suit, a teen girl locked behind his eyes, her stolen face frozen as your laughing avatar. CRT on floor hums, Venn screen showing GUILT.EXE where identities knot; rubber-band circles won’t snap back until the unposted “BINGO!” joke appears. Fluorescents flicker above, keys clatter unseen, aftershave and ozone hang in air.
